task.mission_start: Enter the plane and locate the ~y~Cargoplane~w~ and ~y~hack the network ~w~to ~r~prevent jets~w~.
task.plant_bombs: ~y~Parachute ~w~onto the plane and plants ~r~bombs ~w~ on each ~y~wing~w~.
task.drop_off_goods: Head to the ~y~drop off location ~w~on your ~g~map~w~.

error.items_not_found: ~r~You don't have all the loot on you!
